name: RoboWave
description:
RoboWave

How  to play:

  • Aim with the mouse
  • Left click to shoot

Protip:

  • Block Enemies bullets with your gun
  • You can hit Enemies with your melee attack by moving your gun arround

Credits:

Programed By Emanuel Acosta (@emanvidmaker)
Art & Design By Kelvin Manuel Santiago Colón

Hecho para el 11vo festival de videojuegos de Atlantic University College
